title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
2 point(s) maximum

Refinement: visual (1 point)

• Use a dark/no light box

• Cover the guinea pig/hand

• Use guinea pig/hand models

• Stop movement of guinea pig/hand

• Blind mosquitoes

Refinement: sulcatone (1 point)

• Use cotton ball/guinea pig/guinea-pig model soaked in sulcatone vs. control without sulcatone

• Use gloved/covered human hand that prevents odorant molecules from being released

• Remove or alter the OR4 gene in mosquitoes
